name: Swadloon

evolution.description: Swadloon can evolve into Leavanny at level 12 and above, only if its Loyalty is +2 or higher. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 13 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Leaf-Wrapped Pokémon. It protects itself from the cold by wrapping up in leaves. It stays on the move, eating leaves in forests.

abilities.name: Leaf Guard
abilities.description: This Pokémon does not suffer from any negative status ailments in harsh sunlight.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: This Pokémon’s speed is doubled in harsh sunlight.

abilities.name: Overcoat
abilities.description: This Pokémon does not take damage from weather-related moves and phenomena like Hail, Weather Ball, etc.
